short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sivi turns your text into graphic designs instantly. This chrome plugin is used for input gathering and media capture

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your text into visual content instantly with Sivi. Using artificial intelligence, you can auto-generate editable banners, social posts, google display ads, and more from your story, webpage, article, etc.
